dialogues.text: Vidhu Vinod Chopra studied filmmaking at the Film & Television Institute of India, Pune. His first documentar An Encounter With Faces, highlighted the plight of India’ children. It was nominated for an Oscar in the Documentar Short Subject category in 1979. Since then, he has directed films like Khamosh, Parinda, Love Story, Kareeb, Mission Kashmir and Eklavya: The Roya Of these, Parinda and Eklavya: The Royal Guard were nomin as India’s official entries to the Oscars in the Best For category in 1989 and 2007 respectively. His film company — Vinod Chopra Films — has also produced films like Munna Bhai M.B.B.S., Parineeta, Lage Raho Munn Bhai and 3 Idiots. Vinod Chopra Films continues to receiv national and international recognition.
